attributes.action: Get a vile group removed from Facebook. It is a group that goes by the name of DEAD BABY JOKES!!. This site has to be removed of Facebook as the jokes are sick. There is no joke about losing a baby. I know first had as i have lost two babies, both were stillborn when i was 7 months pregnant. i would be very grateful that you could help as remove groups like this off of Networking sites, and maybe set some rules that Facebook have to vet there site better!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for the company involved, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
